name: PotassiumSparingDiuretics
title: Potassium Sparing Diuretics
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains K-Sparing Diuretic medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on K-Sparing Diuretic medications. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes RxNorm codes for any form of K-Sparing Diuretic Oral medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
